mapper.select: SELECT TP.FEE,TP.AMOUNT,TP.TAACCOUNT,TP.LOCALDATE,TP.LOCALTIME,TC.OPENID,TP.TID,TP.ACCOUNTNO,TP.ISSUING_AMOUNT as issuingAmount,TD.FD_FEE as fdfee,TP.PAYTYPE,TP.BRANCHID FROM TBV_PAYJNLS TP INNER JOIN TBV_CUSTOMER TC ON TP.TID = TC.TID LEFT JOIN qtfund.tdflist TD ON TP.LOCALDATE = TD.FS_ORIGDATE AND TP.LOCALTIME = TD.FS_ORIGTIME WHERE TP.ORDER_ID = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ROWNUM = 1
